title: GreenboneOS: November 2025 Threat Report: Data Theft Leads a Volatile Ransomware Landscape
description: Was November 2025 a quiet month for cyber security? No, of course not. Fallout from the Oracle EBS ransomware campaigns, which began in October, was widespread; over 29 organizations have been claimed by the Cl0p syndicate alone, with over 100 victims in tota…
